# penguin_tencentcloud_virtual_machine_metrics (Data Source)

Read VM metrics from `GET /tencentcloud/vms/:id/metrics`.

## Schema

### Optional

- `range` (String)

### Read-Only

- `cpu_average_percent` (Number)
- `end` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `memory_average_percent` (Number)
- `network_in_kb` (Number)
- `network_out_kb` (Number)
- `start` (String)
